verses.verse: וְאַחַר֙ <WH310> Now after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these בְּמַלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> in the reign אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֣סְתְּא <WH783> of Artaxerxes מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king פָּרָ֑ס <WH6539> of Persia עֶזְרָא֙ <WH5830> Ezra בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׂרָיָ֔ה <WH8304> of Seraiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <WH5838> of Azariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חִלְקִיָּֽה׃ <WH2518> of Hilkiah
בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son שַׁלּ֥וּם <WH7967> of Shallum בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צָד֖וֹק <WH6659> of Zadok בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיטֽוּב׃ <WH285> of Ahitub
בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son אֲמַרְיָ֥ה <WH568> of Amariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <WH5838> of Azariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְרָיֽוֹת׃ <WH4812> of Meraioth
בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son זְרַֽחְיָ֥ה <WH2228> of Zerahiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עֻזִּ֖י <WH5813> of Uzzi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בֻּקִּֽי׃ <WH1231> of Bukki

בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son אֲבִישׁ֗וּעַ <WH50> of Abishua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פִּֽינְחָס֙ <WH6372> of Phinehas בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <WH499> of Eleazar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> priest הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> the chief

ה֤וּא <WH1931> This עֶזְרָא֙ <WH5830> This Ezra עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> went up מִבָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> from Babylon וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> This סֹפֵ֤ר <WH5608> scribe מָהִיר֙ <WH4106> and he [was] a ready בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> in the law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> of Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> had given יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> granted ל֣וֹ הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king כְּיַד־ <WH3027> according to the hand יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָיו֙ <WH430> his God עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all בַּקָּשָׁתֽוֹ׃ <WH1246> him all his request פ

וַיַּֽעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> And there went up מִבְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> [some] of the children יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> of Israel וּמִן־ <WH4480> Some הַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <WH3548> and of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֜ם <WH3881> and the Levites וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֧ים <WH7891> and the singers וְהַשֹּׁעֲרִ֛ים <WH7778> and the porters וְהַנְּתִינִ֖ים <WH5411> and the Nethinims אֶל־ <WH413> to יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> unto Jerusalem בִּשְׁנַת־ <WH8141> year שֶׁ֖בַע <WH7651> in the seventh לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֥סְתְּא <WH783> of Artaxerxes הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> And he came יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַחֲמִישִׁ֑י <WH2549> in the fifth הִ֛יא <WH1931> which שְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖ית <WH7637> which [was] in the seventh לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king

כִּ֗י <WH3588> on בְּאֶחָד֙ <WH259> For upon the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> [day] of the first ה֣וּא <WH1931> he יְסֻ֔ד <WH3246> began הַֽמַּעֲלָ֖ה <WH4609> he to go up מִבָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> from Babylon וּבְאֶחָ֞ד <WH259> and on the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַחֲמִישִׁ֗י <WH2549> [day] of the fifth בָּ֚א <WH935> came אֶל־ <WH413> to יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> he to Jerusalem כְּיַד־ <WH3027> hand אֱלֹהָ֖יו <WH430> of his God הַטּוֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> according to the good עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For עֶזְרָא֙ <WH5830> For Ezra הֵכִ֣ין <WH3559> had prepared לְבָב֔וֹ <WH3824> his heart לִדְר֛וֹשׁ <WH1875> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> the law יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God וְלַעֲשֹׂ֑ת <WH6213> and to do וּלְלַמֵּ֥ד <WH3925> [it] and to teach בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> in Israel חֹ֥ק <WH2706> statutes וּמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> and judgments ס

וְזֶ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> now this פַּרְשֶׁ֣גֶן <WH6572> Now this [is] the copy הַֽנִּשְׁתְּוָ֗ן <WH5406> of the letter אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which נָתַן֙ <WH5414> gave הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֔סְתְּא <WH783> Artaxerxes לְעֶזְרָ֥א <WH5830> unto Ezra הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> the priest הַסֹּפֵ֑ר <WH5608> the scribe סֹפֵ֞ר <WH5608> [even] a scribe דִּבְרֵ֧י <WH1697> of the words מִצְוֹת־ <WH4687> of the commandments יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְחֻקָּ֖יו <WH2706> and of his statutes עַל־ <WH5921> unto יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> to Israel פ

אַ֨רְתַּחְשַׁ֔סְתְּא <WH783> Artaxerxes מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4430> king מַלְכַיָּ֑א <WH4430> of kings לְעֶזְרָ֣א <WH5831> unto Ezra כָ֠הֲנָא <WH3549> the priest סָפַ֨ר <WH5613> a scribe דָּתָ֜א <WH1882> of the law דִּֽי־ <WH1768> forasmuch אֱלָ֧הּ <WH426> of the God שְׁמַיָּ֛א <WH8065> of heaven גְּמִ֖יר <WH1585> perfect וּכְעֶֽנֶת׃ <WH3706> [peace] and at such a time

מִנִּי֮ <WH4481> I שִׂ֣ים <WH7761> make טְעֵם֒ <WH2942> a decree דִּ֣י <WH1768> who כָל־ <WH3606> that all מִתְנַדַּ֣ב <WH5069> which are minded of their own freewill בְּמַלְכוּתִי֩ <WH4437> in my realm מִן־ <WH4481> they of עַמָּ֨ה <WH5972> the people יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3479> of Israel וְכָהֲנ֣וֹהִי <WH3549> and [of] his priests וְלֵוָיֵ֗א <WH3879> and Levites לִמְהָ֧ךְ <WH1946> to go up לִֽירוּשְׁלֶ֛ם <WH3390> to Jerusalem עִמָּ֖ךְ <WH5974> with thee יְהָֽךְ׃ <WH1946> go

כָּל־ <WH3606> as קֳבֵ֗ל <WH6903> according to דִּי֩ <WH1768> which מִן־ <WH4481> according קֳדָ֨ם <WH6925> by מַלְכָּ֜א <WH4430> the king וְשִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7655> and of his seven יָעֲטֹ֙הִי֙ <WH3272> counsellors שְׁלִ֔יחַ <WH7972> thou art sent לְבַקָּרָ֥א <WH1240> to enquire עַל־ <WH5922> concerning יְה֖וּד <WH3061> Judah וְלִֽירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <WH3390> and Jerusalem בְּדָ֥ת <WH1882> according to the law אֱלָהָ֖ךְ <WH426> of thy God דִּ֥י <WH1768> which בִידָֽךְ׃ <WH3028> which [is] in thine hand

וּלְהֵיבָלָ֖ה <WH2987> And to carry כְּסַ֣ף <WH3702> the silver וּדְהַ֑ב <WH1722> and gold דִּֽי־ <WH1768> whose מַלְכָּ֣א <WH4430> which the king וְיָעֲט֗וֹהִי <WH3272> and his counsellors הִתְנַדַּ֙בוּ֙ <WH5069> have freely offered לֶאֱלָ֣הּ <WH426> unto the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3479> of Israel דִּ֥י <WH1768> whose בִֽירוּשְׁלֶ֖ם <WH3390> [is] in Jerusalem מִשְׁכְּנֵֽהּ׃ <WH4907> habitation

וְכֹל֙ <WH3606> And all כְּסַ֣ף <WH3702> the silver וּדְהַ֔ב <WH1722> and gold דִּ֣י <WH1768> which תְהַשְׁכַּ֔ח <WH7912> that thou canst find בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3606> in all מְדִינַ֣ת <WH4083> the province בָּבֶ֑ל <WH895> of Babylon עִם֩ <WH5974> with הִתְנַדָּב֨וּת <WH5069> the freewill offering עַמָּ֤א <WH5972> of the people וְכָֽהֲנַיָּא֙ <WH3549> and of the priests מִֽתְנַדְּבִ֔ין <WH5069> offering willingly לְבֵ֥ית <WH1005> for the house אֱלָהֲהֹ֖ם <WH426> of their God דִּ֥י <WH1768> which בִירוּשְׁלֶֽם׃ <WH3390> which [is] in Jerusalem

כָּל־ <WH3606> all קֳבֵ֣ל <WH6903> with דְּנָה֩ <WH1836> with this אָסְפַּ֨רְנָא <WH629> speedily תִקְנֵ֜א <WH7066> thou mayest buy בְּכַסְפָּ֣א <WH3702> money דְנָ֗ה <WH1836> this תּוֹרִ֤ין ׀ <WH8450> bullocks דִּכְרִין֙ <WH1798> rams אִמְּרִ֔ין <WH563> lambs וּמִנְחָתְה֖וֹן <WH4504> with their meat offerings וְנִסְכֵּיה֑וֹן <WH5261> and their drink offerings וּתְקָרֵ֣ב <WH7127> and offer הִמּ֔וֹ <WH1994> them עַֽל־ <WH5922> upon מַדְבְּחָ֔ה <WH4056> the altar דִּ֛י <WH1768> which בֵּ֥ית <WH1005> of the house אֱלָהֲכֹ֖ם <WH426> of your God דִּ֥י <WH1768> which בִירוּשְׁלֶֽם׃ <WH3390> which [is] in Jerusalem

וּמָ֣ה <WH4101> Whatever דִי֩ <WH1768> forasmuch [עֲלַיִךְ כ] (עֲלָ֨ךְ <WH5921> and ק) וְעַל־ <WH5922> to thee and to [אֶחַיִךְ כ] (אֶחָ֜ךְ <WH252> brother ק) יִיטַ֗ב <WH3191> shall seem good בִּשְׁאָ֛ר <WH7606> with the rest כַּסְפָּ֥א <WH3702> of the silver וְדַהֲבָ֖ה <WH1722> and the gold לְמֶעְבַּ֑ד <WH5648> to do כִּרְע֥וּת <WH7470> after the will אֱלָהֲכֹ֖ם <WH426> of your God תַּעַבְדֽוּן׃ <WH5648> that do

וּמָֽאנַיָּא֙ <WH3984> The vessels דִּֽי־ <WH1768> which מִתְיַהֲבִ֣ין <WH3052> also that are given לָ֔ךְ לְפָלְחָ֖ן <WH6402> thee for the service בֵּ֣ית <WH1005> of the house אֱלָהָ֑ךְ <WH426> of thy God הַשְׁלֵ֕ם <WH8000> [those] deliver קֳדָ֖ם <WH6925> thou before אֱלָ֥הּ <WH426> the God יְרוּשְׁלֶֽם׃ <WH3390> of Jerusalem

וּשְׁאָ֗ר <WH7606> And whatsoever more חַשְׁחוּת֙ <WH2818> careful בֵּ֣ית <WH1005> for the house אֱלָהָ֔ךְ <WH426> of thy God דִּ֥י <WH1768> which יִפֶּל־ <WH5308> which thou shalt have occasion לָ֖ךְ לְמִנְתַּ֑ן <WH5415> to bestow תִּנְתֵּ֕ן <WH5415> bestow מִן־ <WH4481> [it] out of בֵּ֖ית <WH1005> house גִּנְזֵ֥י <WH1596> treasure מַלְכָּֽא׃ <WH4430> the king's

וּ֠מִנִּי <WH4481> And I אֲנָ֞ה <WH576> [even] I אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֤סְתְּא <WH783> Artaxerxes מַלְכָּא֙ <WH4430> the king שִׂ֣ים <WH7761> do make טְעֵ֔ם <WH2942> a decree לְכֹל֙ <WH3606> to all גִּזַּֽבְרַיָּ֔א <WH1490> the treasurers דִּ֖י <WH1768> who בַּעֲבַ֣ר <WH5675> which [are] beyond נַהֲרָ֑ה <WH5103> the river דִּ֣י <WH1768> who כָל־ <WH3606> to all דִּ֣י <WH1768> who יִ֠שְׁאֲלֶנְכוֹן <WH7593> shall require עֶזְרָ֨א <WH5831> that whatsoever Ezra כָהֲנָ֜ה <WH3549> the priest סָפַ֤ר <WH5613> the scribe דָּתָא֙ <WH1882> of the law דִּֽי־ <WH1768> who אֱלָ֣הּ <WH426> of the God שְׁמַיָּ֔א <WH8065> of heaven אָסְפַּ֖רְנָא <WH629> speedily יִתְעֲבִֽד׃ <WH5648> of you it be done

עַד־ <WH5705> Unto כְּסַף֮ <WH3702> of silver כַּכְּרִ֣ין <WH3604> talents מְאָה֒ <WH3969> an hundred וְעַד־ <WH5705> until חִנְטִין֙ <WH2591> of wheat כֹּרִ֣ין <WH3734> measures מְאָ֔ה <WH3969> and to an hundred וְעַד־ <WH5705> until חֲמַר֙ <WH2562> of wine בַּתִּ֣ין <WH1325> baths מְאָ֔ה <WH3969> and to an hundred וְעַד־ <WH5705> until בַּתִּ֥ין <WH1325> baths מְשַׁ֖ח <WH4887> of oil מְאָ֑ה <WH3969> and to an hundred וּמְלַ֖ח <WH4416> and salt דִּי־ <WH1768> forasmuch לָ֥א <WH3809> without כְתָֽב׃ <WH3792> prescribing

כָּל־ <WH3606> Whatsoever דִּ֗י <WH1768> for מִן־ <WH4481> according טַ֙עַם֙ <WH2941> account אֱלָ֣הּ <WH426> the God שְׁמַיָּ֔א <WH8065> of heaven יִתְעֲבֵד֙ <WH5648> done אַדְרַזְדָּ֔א <WH149> let it be diligently לְבֵ֖ית <WH1005> for the house אֱלָ֣הּ <WH426> of the God שְׁמַיָּ֑א <WH8065> of heaven דִּֽי־ <WH1768> so לְמָ֤ה <WH4101> why לֶֽהֱוֵא֙ <WH1934> should there be קְצַ֔ף <WH7109> wrath עַל־ <WH5922> against מַלְכ֥וּת <WH4437> the realm מַלְכָּ֖א <WH4430> of the king וּבְנֽוֹהִי׃ <WH1123> and his sons
